name: A. Sweet Problem
statement:
You have three piles of candies: red, green and blue candies: the first
pile contains only red candies and there are r candies in it, the second
pile contains only green candies and there are g candies in it, the
third pile contains only blue candies and there are b candies in it.
Each day Tanya eats exactly two candies of different colors. She is free
to choose the colors of eaten candies: the only restriction that she
can’t eat two candies of the same color in a day.Find the maximal number
of days Tanya can eat candies? Each day she needs to eat two candies.
